title: AMERICAN HORROR STORY Season 10 Official Title REACTION
author: GameSpot Universe
comment: UPDATE: Ryan Murphy has confirmed that AHS: DOUBLE FEATURE will be TWO SEASONS in one calendar year: one set by the sea (cast already announced) and another set by the sand (that cast announcement is coming soon)!!!
I’ll be referring to Season 10 as “AHS: Surf and Turf” from here on out.
I Hope that its 2 different stories but somehow they both connect at the end??? Lets see
Hey American Horror Story seasons are usually like 8 stories going on at once so we’re getting ripped off with only two!

Denis O’Hare is confirmed to be returning and that’s all I care about. Liz Taylor is honestly one of
My favourite characters in all of AHS and Denis is amazing so I’m excited
description:
The official title for AHS Season 10 is Double Feature. Ryan and Greg react to the title announcement and give updates on production and the cast!

Ryan Murphy finally revealed the official name for American Horror Story Season 10: Double Feature. According to the reveal, we'll be getting two horrifying stories in one season - one by the sea, and one by the sand. Our very own Ryan and Greg react to the AHS 10 title, make predictions and theories based on it, and give updates on production and the cast of the upcoming season! 

Subscribe to GameSpot Universe!
